snippet: During snowboard expeditions to Alaska, Jeremy Jones looks for team members who are as versatile as they are dependable. No one embodies this better than the crew’s camp cook.
lead_paragraph: During snowboard expeditions to Alaska, Jeremy Jones looks for team members who are as versatile as they are dependable. No one embodies this better than the crew’s camp cook.

headline.main: Video: Cooks Do It All on Snowboard Expeditions
